# Data Source: aws_organizations_organizational_unit

Terraform data source for getting an AWS Organizations Organizational Unit.

## Example Usage

### Basic Usage

```typescript
// DO NOT EDIT. Code generated by 'cdktf convert' - Please report bugs at https://cdk.tf/bug
import { Construct } from "constructs";
import { Fn, Token, TerraformStack } from "cdktf";
/*
 * Provider bindings are generated by running `cdktf get`.
 * See https://cdk.tf/provider-generation for more details.
 */
import { DataAwsOrganizationsOrganization } from "./.gen/providers/aws/data-aws-organizations-organization";
import { DataAwsOrganizationsOrganizationalUnit } from "./.gen/providers/aws/data-aws-organizations-organizational-unit";
class MyConvertedCode extends TerraformStack {
  constructor(scope: Construct, name: string) {
    super(scope, name);
    const org = new DataAwsOrganizationsOrganization(this, "org", {});
    new DataAwsOrganizationsOrganizationalUnit(this, "ou", {
      name: "dev",
      parentId: Token.asString(Fn.lookupNested(org.roots, ["0", "id"])),
    });
  }
}

```

## Argument Reference

The following arguments are required:

* `parentId` - (Required) Parent ID of the organizational unit.

* `name` - (Required) Name of the organizational unit

## Attribute Reference

This data source exports the following attributes in addition to the arguments above:

* `arn` - ARN of the organizational unit

* `id` - ID of the organizational unit
